songs.title: Come On (Alternate Verse)
songs.lyrics:
[The Notorious B.I.G:]
My style is harder
Than the nipples on a freak
Who the fuck can compete
With the brother with the hardcore speak
When I speak I leave MC's speechless
Nigga repeat this, I leave you teethless
Believe this
Oh God, it's over, Jehova!
When I slay ya jump in the Range Rover
I slay ya

[Outro:]
That's it! That's it! No more lyrics

[Sampled:]
That Brooklyn Bullshit, we on it!
